context_bundle.summary: Hexagonal (Ports & Adapters) architecture isolates core logic from external concerns: Core domain in center, Ports define interfaces, Adapters implement ports (DB adapter, REST adapter, CLI adapter). Enables easy testing (mock adapters) and technology switching.
